modName: Captain America Nightingale version With Custom Sword
summary: Captain America re textured Nightingale Armour and Sword
descriptionHtml:
Armor is standalone! No longer replaces Nightingale; now called 'Captain America'.
Feel free to rename, as the set is enchanted.
All six pieces can only be crafted at the Sky Forge with Leather & Leather Strips.
All six pieces can be improved at a Workbench with said materials.

**************************************************
Description:This is a Blue, White and Red variant of the Nightingale armor set based on Captain America's Costume , utilizing the Cape-less Variant meshes.
(Huge thanks to Gilead Maerlyn for their work on the Capeless Variant, respectively.)
**************************************************
Update
Now with custom Sword,
**************************************************
This is for Male Only.

**************************************************

Installation:
Simply extract the archive into the Skyrim folder, so the .esp, textures folder, and meshes folder all land into your skyrim/data directory.
Typically:
C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim

C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim


Credits:
Gilead Maerlyn for his work and knowledge on transparencies. If you don't like anything hanging from the back, consider his Capeless Nightingale mod:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1560
author: wanoo99
